system.description:
Legendary powered exoskeleton with integrated servo-motors and multilayered ceramite plating. Worn by Space Marines, Inquisitors, and the most elite Imperial forces. Near-impervious to small arms fire and grants superhuman strength.

Effect: Dramatically improves Position and Effect in combat situations. Provides protection from most conventional weapons. Enhances strength-based actions. This is legendary equipment that must be earned through story, not acquired via flashback.
